page.title: 18An Upton Family.
page.content: The Rowan family is a family of five people.Mr and Mrs Rowan are about thirty years old. They have three boys aged two,six and seven and half years.The two eldest children go to school.The school they go to is called St.Josephs,which is about one and half miles away.It is a Roman Catholic school.The children play on the green across the road from thier house.Their other activites are going to the baths, to the park, and watching jazz bands.Mrs Rowan works part time at a clothing factory called Maitlands.Mr Rowan works at Frickley pit. He is a electrician.He was on strike all year in 1984-85.The strike was to fight to keep pits open.Mr.and Mrs.Rowan do not get much time to themselves.. but they manage to go out on Saturday nights.
